summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-1 is fulfilled through modifications to LoginPage.tsx using translation keys from the LanguageContext system. REQ-2 is fulfilled through extensive French translations added to frontend/src/lib/translations.ts covering all LoginPage text content. The implementation follows existing patterns and constraints correctly.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified LanguageContext.tsx implementation with additional state management for translations object
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrains 'Do not modify frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.tsx' and states to use 'existing LanguageContext... from frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.tsx'. However, the diff shows modifications adding useState for translations object (setT, useEffect with setT) which were not requested.
